techniqueRules: Use dashi or umami base early.

snippets.text: Japanese grandma comfort should be gentle, balanced, and broth-rice centered.
Weeknight Japanese profile should use donburi or soup-rice structures for speed.
Kansai cues: lighter seasoning and cleaner dashi profile.
Kanto cues: slightly stronger soy profile and hearty home simmer dishes.
